notAuthorized.title: You must be logged in to use the extended project configurator
notAuthorized.teaser: Don't have an account yet? You can register here...

wizard.title: Extended
wizard.teaser: You get the full project configurator experience here in the extended wizard. If you wish, you can enter all the details of the upcoming project here. Determine features, structure, and design, as well as content for each page or describe special requests. The projects recorded here can be commissioned directly, and results are available in record time.
